summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CardioCoach bilingual EN/FR support. All language switching functionality working perfectly including UI translations, localStorage persistence, and AI Coach language responses.
passed_tests: Settings page loads with EN/FR language toggle buttons
English is selected by default on first load
French language switch works correctly (FR button becomes active)
English language switch works correctly (EN button becomes active)
Language preference persists in localStorage with key 'cardiocoach_lang'
Navigation labels translate correctly (Tableau de bord, Coach, Progression, Parametres)
Coach page placeholder translates to French ('Posez une question sur votre entrainement...')
Workout type badges translate correctly (Run->Course, Cycle->Velo)
AI Coach API accepts language parameter
AI Coach responds in French when language='fr' is sent
AI Coach responds in English when language='en' is sent
All backend API endpoints working (8/8 tests passed)
Backend language system prompts working for EN and FR
Complete round-trip language switching (FR->EN->FR) works perfectly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (8/8 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all bilingual features working)
